channel.title: Lucy on Ravi Raja Merugu
channel.description: Recent content in Lucy on Ravi Raja Merugu

item.title: Lucy Chatbot
item.description: This is a sub project for developing a personal research assistant for RSQUARE LABS (former name for Invaana). The core idea of the Lucy is to learn from the research by individual research users and help the same user or other users based on the collective intelligence aggregated from every user, in the same research activities or concepts.
